set.name: DM-10 Shockwaves of the Shattered Rainbow

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) Instead of having this creature attack, you may tap it to use its {TAP} ability. {TAP} Destroy all creatures that have power 3000 or less. Then look at your opponent's hand. He discards all creatures from it that have power 3000 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) Whenever this creature would break one of your opponent's shields, your opponent shows that shield to you instead of putting it into his hand. If it's a spell that has "shield trigger," you cast it for no cost, then put it into your opponent's graveyard. If it's not, your opponent puts it into his hand. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.) When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take a card from your deck and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.) While this creature is tapped during your opponent's turn, if it hasn't been attacked that turn, your opponent's creatures must attack it if able.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This creature gets +2000 power for each shield you and your opponent have. While this creature has power 6000 or more, it has "Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields)." While this creature has power 15000 or more, it has "triple breaker" instead of "double breaker." (It breaks 3 shields)

property.name: Rules
property.value: This creature gets +3000 power for each civilization in your mana zone. While this creature has power 6000 or more, it has "Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields)." While this creature has power 15000 or more, it has "triple breaker" instead of "double breaker." (It breaks 3 shield)

property.name: Rules
property.value: This creature gets +5000 power for each of your other creatures in the battle zone that has Dragon in its race. Crew breaker-Dragon (This creature breaks one more shield for each of your other creatures in the battle zone that has Dragon in its race.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's shields and put it into his graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, put all the cards from your hand into your mana zone. Then put that many cards from your mana zone into your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, put all your shields into your hand. (You can use the "shield trigger" abilities of those shields.) Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it for no cost.) {BLOCKER} (Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the 2 creatures battle.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: This creature gets +2000 power for each of your other untapped creatures in the battle zone. When this creature would be destroyed, shuffle it into your deck instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This creature gets +2000 power for each tapped card in your opponent's mana zone. While this creature has power 6000 or more, it has "Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields)."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's shields and put it into his graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.) Silent skill (At the start of each of your turns, if this creature is tapped, you may keep it tapped and use its {SILENT} ability.) {SILENT}This creature breaks 2 of your opponent's shields.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.) When you put this creature into the battle zone, put all the cards from your mana zone into your hand and, at the same time, put all the cards from your hand into your mana zone tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.) Instead of having this creature attack, you may tap it to use its {TAP} ability. {TAP} Choose a creature in your graveyard. Return all creatures that have that name from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all other creatures that have 6000 power. Take an extra turn after this one. You lose the game at the end of that turn. Speed attacker (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) While this creature is tapped, each of your other creatures has "power attacker +1500." (While attacking, a creature that has "power attacker +1500" gets +1500 power.) Instead of having this creature attack, you may tap it to use its {TAP} ability. {TAP} Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have 5 or more shields, add the top card of your deck to your shields face down.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Silent skill (At the start of each of your turns, if this creature is tapped, you may keep it tapped and use its {SILENT} ability.) {SILENT}Add the top card of your deck to your shields face down.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This creature gets +1000 power for each of your other untapped creatures in the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the 2 creatures battle.) This creature can't attack players.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Silent skill (At the start of each of your turns, if this creature is tapped, you may keep it tapped and use its {SILENT} ability.) {SILENT}Choose up to 2 of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution-Put on one of your Initiates. Whenever one of your shields would be broken, you may discard 2 cards from your hand instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the 2 creatures battle.) Whenever this creature blocks, choose one of your creatures in the battle zone. Untap it after the battle. This creature can't attack players.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Silent skill (At the start of each of your turns, if this creature is tapped, you may keep it tapped and use its {SILENT} ability.) {SILENT}Add the top card of your deck to your shields face down.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each of your water creatures and nature creatures in the battle zone has "blocker." (Whenever one of your opponent's creatures attacks, you may tap a creature that has "blocker" to stop the attack. Then the 2 creatures battle.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it for no cost.) Search your deck. You may take a spell from your deck, show that spell to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the 2 creatures battle.) Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, this creature blocks if able. This creature can't attack players.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the 2 creatures battle.) During your opponent's turn, each of your other creatures gets +2000 power. This creature can't attack players.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it for no cost.) {BLOCKER} (Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the 2 creatures battle.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it for no cost.) You may destroy one of your creatures. If you do, choose a creature in your hand that costs the same as or less than the number of cards in your mana zone and put it into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it for no cost.) Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player chooses one of his creatures in the battle zone. Tap the rest of the creatures in the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at up to 5 cards from the top of your deck and put them back in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the 2 creatures battle.) Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, this creature blocks if able. This creature can't attack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the 2 creatures battle.) This creature can't attack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This creature gets +1000 power for each tapped card in your opponent's mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Silent skill (At the start of each of your turns, if this creature is tapped, you may keep it tapped and use its {SILENT} ability.) {SILENT}You may add a card from your hand to your shields face down. If you do, choose one of your shields and put it into your hand. You can't use the "shield trigger" ability of that shield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the 2 creatures battle.) Evolution-Put on one of your Liquid People.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your light creatures and darkness creatures can't be blocked.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Silent skill (At the start of each of your turns, if this creature is tapped, you may keep it tapped and use its {SILENT} ability.) {SILENT}Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your creatures that have "silent skill" are put into the battle zone tapped. Whenever one of your creatures that has "silent skill" would be destroyed, put it into your hand instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Silent skill (At the start of each of your turns, if this creature is tapped, you may keep it tapped and use its {SILENT} ability.) {SILENT}Choose a creature in the battle zone or a card in either player's mana zone and return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at up to 3 of your opponent's shields.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it for no cost.) Put a card from your mana zone into your hand. Then put a card from your hand into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it for no cost.) Choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the 2 creatures battle.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, return a card from your mana zone to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it for no cost.) You may destroy a creature. If you do, its owner reveals cards from the top of his deck until he reveals a non-evolution creature. He puts that creature into the battle zone and puts the rest of those cards into his graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you put a Cyber Virus into the battle zone, you may discard up to 2 cards from your hand. For each card you discard, choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your shields and put it into your hand. (You can use the "shield trigger" ability of that shield.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy one of your opponent's untapped creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, if your opponent has 3 or fewer shields, he discards a card at random from his hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Silent skill (At the start of each of your turns, if this creature is tapped, you may keep it tapped and use its {SILENT} ability.) {SILENT}Return a creature from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at your opponent's hand. You may choose a card in it and put it into his mana zone. If you do, choose a card in his mana zone and put it into his hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each of your water creatures and fire creatures in the battle zone has "slayer." (Whenever a creature that has "slayer" battles, destroy the other creature after the battle.)
